Detailed Description

This class is the base pythonised camera from which all others are derived.

When a camera is active, its handleKeyEvent and handleMouseEvent methods will get called according to the camera's place in the event distribution chain. Cameras should not poll for key down events in their update methods, or they may get some not intended for them.

bool BaseCamera::sceneCheck ( Vector3 &  cameraPosInWS,
const Vector3 &  validPosInWS,
const Vector3 &  direction,
const Vector3 &  uprightDirection 
) [static]

This method repositions the camera position so that there is nothing between it and the valid position.

Parameters:
cameraPosInWS The camera position in world coordinates.
validPosInWS The position to slide from.
direction The direction of the camera.
uprightDirection The up direction of the camera.
Returns:
True if the camera collided with the scene. False, otherwise.
